custom.blockTitle: How can we make your life Bett3r?

buttons.label_single: I would like to set up a new deposit account
buttons.label_joint: We would like to set up a new deposit account

buttons.label_single: I would like to set up a new offset account on an existing eligble AMP home loan
buttons.label_joint: We would like to set up a new offset account on an existing eligible AMP home loan

buttons.label_single: I would like to convert an existing eligible deposit account
buttons.label_joint: We would like to convert an existing eligible deposit account

buttons.label_single: I would like to convert an existing eligible offset account
buttons.label_joint: We would like to convert an existing eligible offset account

custom.description_single: Please enter the loan account number that you would like Bett3r to offset.
custom.description_joint: Please enter the joint loan account number that you would like Bett3r to offset. Please note that both applicants must be holders of the loan.

custom.description_single: When switching, your existing deposit account will become your Bett3r Pay account. We will also set up a Bett3r Save and Bett3r Spend account to help manage your finances.
custom.description_joint: When switching, your existing joint deposit account will become your Bett3r Pay account. We will also set up a Bett3r Save and Bett3r Spend account to help manage your finances.
custom.additional_instruction: Please enter the deposit account number that you would like to become your Bett3r Pay account.

custom.description_single: When switching, your existing offset account will become your Bett3r Pay account. We will also set up a Bett3r Save and Bett3r Spend offset account to help manage your finances.
custom.description_joint: When switching, your existing joint offset account will become your Bett3r Pay account. We will also set up a Bett3r Save and Bett3r Spend offset account to help manage your finances.
custom.additional_instruction: Please enter the offset account number that you would like to become your Bett3r Pay account.
